sentences.sContent: I was very conscious of being a misfit at school.
sentences.sCn: 我深深感到自己在学校里格格不入。

synos.tran: 不适合；不适应环境的人

trans.tranCn: 不适合；不适应环境的人
trans.tranOther: someone who does not seem to belong in a particular group of people, and who is not accepted by that group, because they are very different from the other group members
